column4: hey there. Is there anyway I can make my pc autodetect my keyboard just like in the ubuntu installation process. Some keys are not working as they should...
hey there. Is there anyway I can make my pc autodetect my keyboard just like in the ubuntu installation process? Some keys are not working as they should...
you can edit your keyboard in System>admin>  or possibly in System>Preferences
sorry .. I don't have any other suggestion..
